definition: A term referring to the external part or outer layer of an object, typically used to describe the visible or tactile surface of something. It is commonly employed when discussing the texture, appearance, or quality of materials, substances, or physical structures.

examples.german: Die Oberfläche des Sees war spiegelglatt.
examples.english: The surface of the lake was mirror smooth.

examples.german: Die Oberfläche der Tasse war mit Rissen bedeckt.
examples.english: The surface of the cup was covered with cracks.

examples.german: Die Oberfläche des Tisches war aus Glas.
examples.english: The surface of the table was made of glass.

examples.german: Die Oberfläche des Mondes ist von Kratern gezeichnet.
examples.english: The surface of the moon is marked by craters.

examples.german: Die Oberfläche der Straße war glatt und rutschig.
examples.english: The surface of the road was smooth and slippery.
